goal.name: andromda:run
goal.description: Runs the AndroMDA processor with AndroMDA plugins (i.e. cartridges and translation-libraries) found on your CLASSPATH.

goal.name: andromda:schema2xmi
goal.description: Runs AndroMDA's Schema2XMI to provide XMI generation from a database schema. See Plugin Settings for more information on how to configure this goal.

goal.name: andromda:start-server
goal.description: Starts the AndroMDA server instance. When this is running, modeling processing will occur on the server. This dramatically helps to improve initialization and loading time when running AndroMDA because thoese things are taken care of in advance (before the model is actually processed).
